::Lavatron::

The missile hits Lavatron, jerking him back, but he doesn't let go of 
the arm.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., "LurkerAbyss" <1641coburn@h...> wrote:
> ::Surgital::
> 
>      Surgital felt electricity run through hkm and cause more pain.
> 
>      "Aghh!" he cried.
> 
>      Surgital's shoulder opened up to reveal a missile launcher.  He 
shot a missile at Lavatron, but if it hit, it would affect himself too 
because he was using a ranged missile in melee combat.
